attributes.action: Funding to entertainment venues limiting further damage to our nightlife economy
attributes.additional_details: This is a Multi Billion pound industry that is required to be restored and saved. It has always and will continue to be a requirement of our daily lives. So many people have sacrificed too much to loose their businesses and require funding as a stepping stone to recovery. These businesses need the funding as they put so much back into the economy financially and socially.
attributes.background: To review current legislation and options that accommodate business in the nightlife industry which supplements revenue lost to keep businesses from closure and possible redundancies.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Let Us Dance - Support nightclubs, dance music events and festivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332789

Support the four pillar plan for recovery in the performing arts & entertainment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332353

Give further financial support to the Events and Hospitality industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329985
